meaningMnemonic: If you have a <kanji>residence</kanji> that's also your <kanji>house</kanji>, it's still your <vocabulary>residence</vocabulary>. But you probably have a lot of money if you can own your own house, so it's probably a nice, big <vocabulary>mansion</vocabulary> too.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
